column4: Hello new friends!   I have just installed Ubuntu Lucid and I want to use IRC.   I am thinking that Empathy would be the way to go. Does anyone know how to use Empathy with IRC?
iy you have used pidgin before, is almost the same: you create an irc account and select a server t oconect
I think I have it connected - but I don't know how to join a room.  (I am new to IRC as well.)
